caption: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? 🚀 Swipe through for our top tips that will boost your productivity and help you shine at work! 💼✨ Who doesn’t love a little career glow-up? Tag a friend who needs to see this and let’s elevate together! 🙌 #CareerGoals #WorkSmart

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A tips social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? 🚀 Swipe through for our top tips that will boost your pr, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
